title: Robin Hood junior
creator_credit: John Black, Matt McCarthy, Children's Film Foundation and Brocket Productions
brief_description: Lord Gilbert is away at the Crusades and the evil Baron has taken over Locksay Castle. Lord Gilbert’s daughter, Marion, flees the castle with the Great Seal of Locksay. The Baron wants it back but he hasn’t counted on the youthful cunning of Robin and the village children. Rated: G
